attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The official logo has been unveiled and it is an embarrassment to the country, the logo is already dated and will not withstand 5 years of use. It seems to of been designed to instil no sense of national pride and in a bid to appeal to everybody it has resulted in a meaningless symbol.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
